description: This file defines a LocalStorageService class that provides persistent storage functionalities using shared_preferences in a Dart/Flutter project. It manages favorites, cart items, and user settings, serving as an abstraction layer for local data persistence.

classes.name: LocalStorageService
classes.description: A singleton service class for managing local storage for favorites, cart, and user settings in a Flutter application.

methods.name: getInstance
methods.description: Provides a singleton instance of LocalStorageService initialized with SharedPreferences.

methods.name: getFavorites
methods.description: Retrieves a list of favorite book IDs from local storage.

methods.name: saveFavorites
methods.description: Saves a list of favorite book IDs to local storage.

methods.name: getCart
methods.description: Retrieves the list of cart items, deserializing from JSON stored in local storage.

methods.name: saveCart
methods.description: Serializes and saves the cart items to local storage.

methods.name: getUserSettings
methods.description: Retrieves user settings stored as JSON in local storage.

methods.name: saveUserSettings
methods.description: Saves user settings as JSON to local storage.
